ygData.subject: Re: At what point does a smith become fully functional?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks.  It never occured to me to check outside the South Gate or Northern Ro.  I did scour all 3 Freeport zones and East and West Commonlands without
ygData.messageBody:
> needle and thimble molds are right outside of east freeport. Go out east
> freeport gate and run straight to zone. Once zoned...run
> straight till you
> see the inns that sell stuff...they are in one of those...good luck.

Thanks. It never occured to me to check outside the South Gate or Northern
Ro. I did scour all 3 Freeport zones and East and West Commonlands without
finding them. Luckily, I discovered the perfect place to make sewing kits
in High Pass Hold (in the Serpent's Supply). I have finally maxed my skill
out for anything except banded cloaks (level 175, here I come).
